name: yamakawa
normalized: ah!
a very good morning to you, professor marika.

name: marika
normalized: good morning.
even though she had been bewildered last night, she seemed to be completely normal this morning.
she had assumed her shrewd appearance again as usual, be it while walking or talking.
so much so that it was difficult for any person to approach her.
she had even brought her own breakfast to the table and was eating it calmly.
it was extremely difficult to get rid of the growing effects of the aphrodisiac── parasite, once it started ravaging the body.
that being the case, even the rubbing of her clothes against her skin was bound to be assaulting her with sexual pleasure.
oh well──

name: yamakawa
normalized: i have been wondering about it for a while now, but you really can use chopsticks quite skilfully.

name: marika
normalized: right.

name: yamakawa
normalized: where did you learn that?

name: marika
normalized: from miss cara.

name: yamakawa
normalized: that makes sense then.
she picked up a small piece of dried mackerel with her chopsticks, before bringing it to her mouth.
she placed the dried mackerel inside her mouth and chewed it thoroughly, before gulping it down, all the while smiling in a manner which i could barely comprehend.
to find human food delicious, despite being a vampire…
i was looking forward to seeing how long it would last.

name: yamakawa
normalized: professor cara has taught you a variety of other things as well, hasn't she?
as a result, you are in a position to pass those teachings onward now.
how has it gone?

name: marika
normalized: … difficult.

name: yamakawa
normalized: isn't that the truth.

name: marika
normalized: you are a professional, aren't you?

name: yamakawa
normalized: no, no.
even though i am something of the sort, i still have quite a long way to go.
i wish i could teach much better than what i am currently capable of.

name: marika
normalized: you find it difficult despite being a professional, is it?

name: yamakawa
normalized: yes.
ah!
speaking of which… how do you find the students, being a combat professional yourself, professor marika?

name: marika
normalized: they are quite capable.
some of the students even possess strong spiritual powers, even though they aren't on par with kitae.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i am glad to hear that.
they must be so proud to have someone like professor marika teach them personally.
this was a school which trained its students to fight against us, vampires.
as a result, it was natural for its students to possess tremendous spiritual powers as well, similar to kitae or kamimura the hunter.
marika was in charge of combat training, which was undertaken in this school.
that being the case, should i proceed cautiously or not?
it would be better if i monitored marika discreetly.
if she was struck by a spiritual or magical shock, then the bug would surely die.
if that did happen, then not only would i be unable to suppress marika's powers during the night, but all her memories would be restored as well.
failure of my plan would directly result in my death.
normally, there was no way that the students could ever land a successful strike on the grim reaper.
however, it was very much a possibility now, now that her body was being ravaged by the bug and the aphrodisiac.
should i call for the assistance of our collaborator in this school, who was working along with kitae in order to plan the infiltration of my subordinates?
indeed.
i was overthinking it.
there really wouldn't be any problems.
she was such a powerful individual that she was known as the grim reaper.
she was also the leader of the order of assassin knights and a woman who had driven me down into the abyss of death once already.
there was no way that she could ever get struck by an attack conjured by humans, especially students.
moreover, it would be wise of me to not arouse her suspicion by sniffing around her as well.
i decided to let marika be for now.
